taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table displayed in the Editor area.
taskbody.context: This section explains how to add items to a table column.

step.cmd: Click the table column in which you want to add the item.
Right-click in the column, and select Add Item.

ul.li: Due to technical limitations, exporting a table that contains multiple items in a column to Excel or PDF is not well supported.

When the alignment of items within the column is derived both from the Width (in percent) and the Horizontal Alignment properties, it is recommended that you do not add other items such as icons or buttons; otherwise, the correct alignment of the data is not guaranteed.
